mapper.select: select `order_no`,`merch_no`,`audit_type`,`audit_result`,`auditor`,`audit_time`,`crt_time`,`memo`,amount,poundage from pay_audit where order_no = #{orderNo} and merch_no = #{merchNo} and audit_type = #{auditType}
mapper.insert: insert into pay_audit ( `order_no`, `merch_no`, `audit_type`, `audit_result`, `auditor`, `audit_time`, `crt_time`, `memo`, amount, poundage ) values ( #{orderNo}, #{merchNo}, #{auditType}, #{auditResult}, #{auditor}, #{auditTime}, #{crtTime}, #{memo}, #{amount}, #{poundage} )
